question: In 2015, a mission got formed in Afghanistan as replacement to the International Security Assistance Force (ISAF). What is the name of the new mission?
option3: Special Inspector General for Afghanistan Reconstruction (SIGAR)
explanation: In 2015, ISAF ended it's formal operations and transferred the full security responsibility to Afghan Government. Resolute Support Mission, also known as Operation Resolute Support, got formed as the replacement to ISAF. The mission, led by NATO, aims to train, advice, assist mission to continue fight against Taliban insurgents, Haqqani networks and ISIS-K.
